LanguageData.VCE_UncookedStewSimple.label: uncooked simple stew
LanguageData.VCE_UncookedStewSimple.description: An uncooked simple stew. This needs to be cooked in a stew pot to be edible.
LanguageData.VCE_CookedStewSimple.label: simple stew
LanguageData.VCE_CookedStewSimple.description: A simple stew slow cooked from a few ingredients.
LanguageData.VCE_UncookedStewFine.label: uncooked fine stew
LanguageData.VCE_UncookedStewFine.description: An uncooked fine stew. This needs to be cooked in a stew pot to be edible.
LanguageData.VCE_CookedStewFine.label: fine stew
LanguageData.VCE_CookedStewFine.description: A complex stew assembled with care from a wide selection of ingredients.
LanguageData.VCE_UncookedStewLavish.label: uncooked lavish stew
LanguageData.VCE_UncookedStewLavish.description: An uncooked lavish stew. This needs to be cooked in a stew pot to be edible.
LanguageData.VCE_CookedStewLavish.label: lavish stew
LanguageData.VCE_CookedStewLavish.description: A masterpiece of the culinary arts, this stew nourishes the body, mind, and soul.
